
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}

surviving_fraction <- function(c, d) {
  
  k_oer <- 3.28
  oer_min <- 1
  oer_alpha_max <- 1.75
  oer_beta_max <- 3.25
  
  alpha <- oer_alpha_max/((((oer_alpha_max - oer_min)*k_oer)/(c + k_oer)) + oer_min);
  beta <- oer_beta_max/((((oer_beta_max - oer_min)*k_oer)/(c + k_oer)) + oer_min);
  
  return(exp(-n*(alpha*d + beta*emp::Pow(d,2))))
}  
```

```{r}
ggplot() + layer(geom="path", stat="function", fun=surviving_fraction)
```
